creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 9 names on the upper right corner, probably names of performers and musicians of manzai
markings:
censor seal: kiwame 極; publisher's seal: Tsutaya Jūzaburō
Collector's seal: C.M. (Carl Mienzil)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Untitled series of Niwaka festival dances representing the Twelve Months
title: The First Month, Manzai Dancers
